game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    The game file which control all the game flow. i.e. Controller in the MVC architecture model
    Author:
    Dmitry kryukov, Ksenia Popova
    See Also:
    DiceEnum, CardsEnum, GamePhaseEnum, Continent, Country, Player, Neighbour, DicePanel, MapPanel, RightStatusPanel, TopStatusPanel
